DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to explore whether the addition of Hemopatch to standard care can reduce prolonged air leaks and shorten the use of air drainage tube after surgery in thoracic lung surgery patients at high risk for prolonged air leaks.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Prospective, Single Blinded, Randomized Trial of Hemopatch Compared to Standard Techniques to Achieve Air Leak Control After Complex Thoracic Surgical Procedures
